tool_description: Configures service mesh (Istio, Linkerd, Consul Connect) for microservice communication, security, and observability.

mesh_type.description: Service mesh type: istio, linkerd, consul

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access

error_messages: Unsupported mesh type: Use one of [istio, linkerd, consul].
Namespace not found: Specified namespace does not exist.
Kubeconfig authentication failed: Verify kubeconfig credentials.
Mesh installation not found: Service mesh must be installed on cluster first.
Invalid traffic policy: Check traffic policy syntax for selected mesh type.
Gateway configuration error: Verify gateway configuration syntax.
usage: Provide mesh_type, namespace, and kubeconfig. Optionally configure enable_mtls, enable_tracing, enable_metrics, traffic_policies, and gateway_config.
